title: Optimal solution of multiobjective stable environmental economic power dispatch problem considering probabilistic wind and solar PV generation
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Aamir Ali, Sumbal Aslam, M.U. Keerio, Sohrab Mirsaeidi, Noor Hussain Mugheri, Muhammad Ismail, Ghulam Abbas, Salwa Othmen
